mdRecord.dcterms:title: New sectional map of the eastern & southern portion of the state of Florida / issued by the Land Department of the Florida Southern Railway Co., showing the lands owned & offered for sale by said department ; the Orange Belt route, its branches & connections ; 4.000.000 acres of land for sale .. ; W.P. Couper, Land Commissioner, Florida Southern Railway Company, Palatka, Florida, 1887
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Florida Southern Railway Co. Land Department. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 80 x 51 cm., on sheet 82 x 53 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Coverage includes all of Florida except the panhandle. [original]
Includes explanations of the sectioning and the coloring systems, and has text "for full descriptive notes see back of this map." The back of the map, however, is blank. [original]
Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington, D.C. [original]
Inset: untitled map of the rail and steamboat routes of the Florida Southern Railway Co. [original]
Advertisement inset, with illustration, of the Hotel Punta Gorda. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Very fragile, with many large tears. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Florida Southern Railway Co.--Maps
Real property--Florida--Maps
Railroads--Florida--Maps
Steamboat lines--Florida--Maps
Florida--Maps
